ai-patthana15.12:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
ai-patthana15.12:1.1_0: None whose teaching is not the cause or condition for the sake of limited period. ...
ai-patthana15.12:2.1_0: Because of the expansive teaching doesn’t come to a cause.
ai-patthana15.12:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
ai-patthana15.12:3.1_0: Because of this quality doesn’t give rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana15.12:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
